scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run serve" "cd ui && npm run serve"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd api && npm i" "cd ui && npm i"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd api && npm run build" "cd ui && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && npm run start" "cd ui && npm run start"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd api && npm run lint" "cd ui && npm run lint"
scripts.lintFix: concurrently "cd api && npm run lintFix" "cd ui && npm run lintFix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd api && npm run test" "cd ui && npm run test"
